PHRASE.LANG: Skinny Minny is back from the dead and following in the footsteps of her brother, Skinny Vinny. Why should he have all the fun! [#Legal]
Skinny Minny revient d'entre les morts et marche dans les pas de son frère, Skinny Vinny. Pourquoi devrait-il être le seul à s'amuser! [#Legal]
Skinny Minny ist von den Toten zurückgekehrt und tritt in die Fußstapfen ihres Bruders Skinny Vinny. Warum sollte nur er sich vergnügen? [#Legal]
Skinny Minny è tornata dal regno dei morti e segue le orme di suo fratello Skinny Vinny. Perché dovrebbe divertirsi solo lui! [#Legal]
Minny Huesos ha regresado de entre los muertos y sigue los pasos de su hermano, Vinny Huesos. ¿Por qué solo puede divertirse él? [#Legal]
스키니 미니가 그녀의 오빠인 스키니 비니의 발자취를 따라서 살아 돌아왔습니다. 그만 즐기라는 법은 없으니까요! [#Legal]
Skinny Minny is back from the dead and following in the footsteps of her brother, Skinny Vinny. Why should he have all the fun! [#Legal]
皮包骨蜜妮死而復生，跟隨哥哥「皮包骨維尼」的腳步回到人間。有好玩的竟然不找我！ [#Legal]
